description:
Discover a classic game on your Nintendo 3DS!
150 magnificent photos of landscapes, decorations, animals, still life, and more.
Stay focused to find all of the hidden differences.
A relaxing classic for the mind that the whole family can enjoy â€“ anywhere!
name: Spot The Differences!
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
